GS40samapviu:623: yan noṣṇatām apagataṃ na kadācid eva /
GS40samapviu:630: naiva takraṃ kṣate dadyān noṣmakāle na durbale /
GS40samapviu:635: paripakvasugandhikapittharasaṃ piba bho nṛpa takraṃ rujāpaharam // 17 //
GS40samapviu:639: takraṃ tribhāgabhinnaṃ tu kevalaṃ mathitaṃ smṛtam // 19 //
GS40samapviu:641: dadhnas tūpari yat toyaṃ tan mastu parikīrtitam // 20 //
GS40samapviu:645: tasmāt triviṣṭape jātaṃ takraṃ śakrasya durlabham // 22 //
GS40samapviu:646: kailāse yadi takram asti giriśaḥ kiṃ nīlaṇṭho bhavet
GS40samapviu:647: vaikuṇṭhe yadi kṛṣṇatām anubhaved adyāpi kiṃ keśavaḥ /
GS40samapviu:650: kuṣṭhitvaṃ ca kuberako dahanatām agniś ca divyasti cet // 23 //
GS40samapviu:651: yad dravyaṃ śaṅkhavarṇaṃ himapaṭalanibhaṃ cārugandhaḥ suśītaṃ
GS40samapviu:654: tat takraṃ sūpadhūpaṃ tv amṛtaguṇanibhaṃ bhāgyavantaḥ pibanti // 24 //
GS40samapviu:659: śītaṃ varṇabalapradaṃ samadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca saṃgrāhakaṃ
GS40samapviu:665: sadyaskaṃ navanītam uddhṛtam idaṃ syāt sarvarogāpaham /
GS40samapviu:672: gavyaṃ vā māhiṣaṃ vāpi navanītaṃ navoddhṛtam /
GS40samapviu:674: śītaṃ varṇabalapradaṃ samadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ hi saṃgrāhakaṃ
GS40samapviu:685: vahner vṛddhiharaṃ vipākamadhuraṃ vṛṣyaṃ ca śītaṃ sadā
GS40samapviu:686: sevyaṃ gavyam idaṃ ghṛtaṃ balakaraṃ sadyaḥsamāvartitam // 1 //
GS40samapviu:687: sarpirgavāṃ cāmṛtakaṃ viṣaghnaṃ cākṣuṣyam ārogyakaraṃ ca vṛṣyam /
GS40samapviu:688: rasāyanaṃ mandam atīva medhyaṃ snehottama ca (goḥ)
GS40samapviu:697: māhiṣyaṃ tan mānuṣaṇāṃ ca śastaṃ balyaṃ vṛṣyaṃ bastisādaṃ karoti /
GS40samapviu:698: medodbhūtaṃ mehakṛcchaityakāri tasmān nityaṃ sarvakālaṃ niṣevyam //
GS40samapviu:701: kāsaśvāsakṣaye vāpi pathyaṃ pāneṣu tal laghu //
GS40samapviu:704: āvikaṃ ghṛtam atīvā gurutvād varjyam eva sukumāranaraiś ca /
GS40samapviu:706: sadya eṣa balapuṣṭikaraṃ syād uṣṭrajaṃ śvayathukāsakaraṃ ca //
GS40samapviu:715: kaphe 'nile yonidoṣe ca śvayathau hatam (śophe kampe ca tad dhitam) // 9 //
GS40samapviu:718: dīpanī (naṃ) laghu vīrye ca vidyād aikaśaphaṃ ghṛtam // 10 //
GS40samapviu:720: cakṣuṣyam agnidaṃ strīṇāṃ sarpiḥ syād atamṛopamam [sic/] /
GS40samapviu:721: vṛddhiṃ karoti dehāgner laghu pāke viṣāpaham // 11 //
GS40samapviu:728: āyurvṛddhiṃ vapur api dṛḍhaṃ saukumāryaṃ karoti
GS40samapviu:730: pathyaṃ bālye vayasi taruṇe vārdhake cāpi pathyaṃ
GS40samapviu:731: nānyat kiñcid bhavati puruṣe sarpiṣaḥ sthaulyakāri // 13 //
GS40samapviu:732: yad vedāgamavedibhir nigaditaṃ sākṣād ihāyur nṛṇāṃ
GS40samapviu:733: yad vaidyais tu rasāyanāya kathitaṃ sadyo jarānāśanam /
GS40samapviu:736: vīryātiśītaṃ ca guṇe vipāke svādu tridoṣeṣu rasāyanaṃ ca /
GS40samapviu:737: tejobalāyuṣyakaraṃ ca medhyaṃ cākṣuṣyam etad ghṛtam āhur āryāḥ // 15 //
GS40samapviu:738: ojastejobhivṛddhiṃ janayati sukhadaṃ kāntikṛt samyag uktaṃ
GS40samapviu:742: vātaghnaṃ pittanāśaṃ svarahati bhave śūddhame (svarakaram agadaṃ kṣudbhrame)
GS40samapviu:747: sarveṣāṃ sarvadaiva prathitaguṇagaṇaṃ sādhu pathyaṃ ghṛtaṃ syāt // 17 //
GS40samapviu:761: nirāmayānāṃ navayauvanānāṃ kṛtvā gavāṃ yacchata dhautamaddhiḥ /
GS40samapviu:762: vahnau vipakvaṃ navanītanūnaṃ [yogyaṃ] yogyaṃ ghṛtaṃ tad gajarājasevitām [?] // 23 //
GS40samapviu:765: uṣṇaṃ vipāke kaṭukaṃ satiktaṃ kaphāpahaṃ vātanivāraṇaṃ ca /
GS40samapviu:767: tilatailam alaṃkaroti keśyaṃ madhuraṃ tiktakaṣāyam uṣṇatīkṣṇam /
GS40samapviu:769: balakṛtkaphavātajaṃ ca [jantu] kharjū vraṇakaṇḍūtiharaṃ ca [kānti] dāyi // 2 //
GS40samapviu:770: kaṇḍūharaṃ kāntivivardhanaṃ ca arśo [varco] vivṛddhi vraṇaropaṇaṃ ca /
GS40samapviu:771: tilasya jātaṃ khalu yac ca tailaṃ bāleṣu vṛddheṣv api taila [pathya]m etat // 3 //
GS40samapviu:772: na pittaroge na ca śoṇitotthe pathyaṃ mahāvātavikārasaṃdhau /
GS40samapviu:773: tilodbhavaṃ tailam udaāharanti vātāśritān hanti samastadoṣān // 4 //
GS40samapviu:775: pāmādidoṣāpaharaṃ ca tailaṃ abhyañjanaṃ sarṣapasaṃbhavaṃ ca // 5 //
GS40samapviu:777: tīkṣṇoṣṇaṃ picchalaṃ visraṃ raktair aṇḍodbhavaṃ tv ati {cf. Aṣṭāṅgahṛdaya 5.58cd} // 6 //
GS40samapviu:782: kharjūś ca keśaś ca karoti koṣṭhe [kaṇḍūṃ ca karoti dṛṣṭeḥ]
GS40samapviu:787: ākṣaṃ svādu himaṃ keśyaṃ guru pittānilāpaham /
GS40samapviu:802: lepe hitaṃ tatra gudāṅkurāṇāṃ gajoddhavaṃ lehyamahobhivṛddhiḥ (?) /
GS40samapviu:803: sarvo guruś cāpi rasāyanānāṃ kāsāpaho vāpi madhuprayogaḥ // 4 //
GS40samapviu:804: mehe hitaṃ syān malachardināśaḥ hikkātisāre vraṇakuṣṭhahantā /
GS40samapviu:808: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ vāpi kṛtrimaṃ ca viṣāpaham (viṣaṃ haret) /
GS40samapviu:812: hitaṃ caiva rakte vāpi hitaṃ ca tat // 7 //
GS40samapviu:813: pāke svādu madhu śreṣṭhaṃ vipāke doṣasaṃyutam /
GS40samapviu:816: amlena madhuraṃ svādu tan madhuś cāpi doṣakṛt) (?) // 9 //
GS40samapviu:818: snigdhaś ca saṃtarpaṇabṛṃhaṇaś ca saṃjīvanaḥ svādurasaḥ śramaghnaṃ /
GS40samapviu:819: vṛṣyaś ca pittaśramavātahārī hy antarvidāhī kaphakṛtsitekṣuḥ //
GS40samapviu:820: tadvat sakṛṣṇo hi bhaved guṇaiś ca vṛṣyo bhavet tarpaṇadāhahantā /
GS40samapviu:823: kāntāras tāpasekṣuḥ syāt kāṣṭhekṣuś ca vicitrakaḥ // 3 //
GS40samapviu:826: ity etā jātayaḥ sthūlā guṇān vakṣyāmy ataḥ param // 4 //
GS40samapviu:828: avidāhi gurur vṛṣyaḥ pauṇḍrako bhīrukas tathā // 5 ///
GS40samapviu:829: anye tulyaguṇāḥ kecit sakṣāro vaṃśako mataḥ /
GS40samapviu:830: vaṃśavacchvetapauṇḍras tu kiñcid uṣṇaḥ sa vātahā // 6 //
GS40samapviu:832: evaṃguṇas tu kāṣṭhekṣuḥ sa tu vātaprakopanaḥ // 7 //
GS40samapviu:839: agreṣu (ṣvā) madhuro jñeyaḥ ikṣur ālavaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GS40samapviu:844: phāṇitaṃ guru madhuraṃ abhiṣyandi ca bṛṃhaṇam // 12 //
GS40samapviu:845: śukraṃ kaphakaraṃ caiva pittaghnaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ /
GS40samapviu:862: rūkṣā vivchedanī caiva kaṣāyā madhurāpi ca // 18 //
GS40samapviu:864: vṛṣyaḥ śītoṣṇapittaṃ śamayati madhuro bṛṃhaṇaḥ śleṣmakāri /
GS40samapviu:865: snigdho hṛdyassaraś ca śramaśamanapaṭur mūtraśuddhiṃ karoti /
GS40samapviu:867: vardhate śamayati ca malān tarpaṇaṃ cendriyāṇāṃ
GS40samapviu:871: kāntāro raktavarṇaḥ syāt kośākāras tathaiva ca /
GS40samapviu:872: śvetas tu pauṇḍrako jñeyaḥ trayaḥ śreṣṭhās tathekṣavaḥ //
GS40samapviu:875: agrabhāge punas tasya ikṣoḥ syāl lavaṇo laghu // 20 //
GS40samapviu:884: mūlamadhyadalanāc ca tatkṣaṇāt sī [pī]yate yadi tu yāntriko rasaḥ /
GS40samapviu:885: vātapittaśamanas tadā bhavet tarpaṇaś ca malamūtraśodhanaḥ // 24 //
GS40samapviu:890: snigdhasvāduraso laghuḥ śramaharaḥ pathyaḥ purāṇo guḍaḥ // 25 ///
GS40samapviu:891: dāhaṃ nivārayati pittam apākaroti tṛṣṇāṃ chinatti vinihanti ca moharmūrchām /
GS40samapviu:892: śoṣaṃ vighaṭṭayati tarpayatīndriyāṇi śītaḥ sadā samadhuraḥ khalu siddhakhaṇḍaḥ // 26 //
GS40samapviu:896: kṣīṇe retasi pāvake ca viṣame kṣīṇe kṣate durbale
GS40samapviu:897: durvāre 'pi ca raktapittakagade sevyā sadā śarkarā // 27 //
GS40samapviu:901: saṃdīpanaṃ madyam atīva tīkṣṇaṃ uṣṇaṃ ca taṣṭāṃ (tṛṣṇā)
GS40samapviu:903: susvādu tiktaṃ kaṭukaṃ tathāmlaṃ jambūrasaṃ susvadanīyam etat // 1 //
GS40samapviu:907: pittāsṛkkaphasārake ca viṣame kārśye tathā pīnase
GS40samapviu:910: (śleṣmāṇaṃ vinihanti yuktam aniśaṃ sevyaṃ sadā prāṇinā)
GS40samapviu:911: kṛśe sthūle hitaṃ rūkṣaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ścoto (sroto)
GS40samapviu:922: tadguṇā vāruṇī hṛdyā laghutīkṣṇā nihanti ca /
GS40samapviu:930: vraṇe pāṇḍvāmaye kuṣṭe na cātyarthaṃ virudhyate /
GS40samapviu:939: mārdvīkaṃ lekhanaṃ hṛdyaṃ nātyuṣṇaṃ madhuraṃ saram // 10 //
GS40samapviu:952: dhānyāmlaṃ bhedi tīkṣṇaṃ surabhi laghutaraṃ śo (so)
GS40samapviu:954: rūkṣaṃ caiva klamaghnaṃ śramaharaviṣadaṃ vastisaṃśodhanaṃ ca /
GS40samapviu:955: śastaṃ vāsthāpanaṃ syāt* laghu viṣaśamanaṃ śvāsarogāpanodi
GS40samapviu:956: gaṇḍūṣo dhāraṇe syān mukhagadanivahe gandhanirnāśanaṃ ca /
GS40samapviu:967: tiktaṃ tīkṣṇaṃ laghūṣṇaṃ salavaṇasurasaṃ pittalaṃ bhedi rūkṣam /
GS40samapviu:968: hṛdyaṃ rucyaṃ krimighnaṃ hutavahajananaṃ kuṣṭhamehau vināśī (śi)
GS40samapviu:972: vikāram etat rūkṣaṃ tathāmlaṃ krimiṣu praśastam /
GS40samapviu:976: snigdho vātaharas tridoṣaśamanaḥ pathyaḥ sadā prāṇināṃ
GS40samapviu:977: śreṣṭhaḥ pauṣṭika [śreṣṭho brīhiṣu ṣaṣṭikaḥ] śramaharaḥ kṛcchrādiḍoṣāpahā /
GS40samapviu:978: gaura(ś cā)śvāsitagaurato 'pi nitarāṃ sevyaḥ karoty uccakaiḥ
GS40samapviu:984: ayaṃ sevyo rājā bhavati hi mahāśāliramalaḥ // 2 //
GS40samapviu:992: ete chinnabhavā bhavanti khalu te viṇmūtrabandhapradāḥ // 3 //
GS40samapviu:994: deśe deśe tu jātāś ca nānāvarṇāś ca śālayaḥ /
GS40samapviu:999: sāgarakhyās tapanīyakāḥ śakunako rodhras tu saugandhikaḥ
GS40samapviu:1015: kṛṣṭi [ṣṇa] śāli [stri] tridoṣaghno madhuraḥ kārśyahā tathā /
GS40samapviu:1021: dhānye śreṣṭhaṃ ṣaṣṭikaṃ rājabhojyaṃ māṃse tv ājaṃ taittirīkaṃ hitaṃ syāt /
GS40samapviu:1022: pānīyaṃ syāt kṛṣṇamṛtsnāsam etaṃ kṣīrājyādau gavyam ādau praśastam //
GS40samapviu:1041: hanyād vātaṃ gurur atiraso rocako bhakṣa (kṣya) māṇaḥ
GS40samapviu:1066: kaṭur vipāke madhuraś ca śimbiḥ pravṛddhaviṇmūtra (mā)
GS40samapviu:1068: sitāsitaḥ pītakaraktavarṇā bhavanti vai naikavidhās tu śibiṃ(mbyaḥ) : //
GS40samapviu:1072: tilo vipāke madhuro baliṣṭhaḥ snigdho vraṇālepanapathya uktaḥ //
GS40samapviu:1075: tileṣu sarpiṣv asita [sarveṣv asitaḥ] pradhāno medhyaḥ sito hīnataras tathānyaḥ //
GS40samapviu:1078: grāhyuṣṇo dhṛtikṛt kaṣāyamadhuras tikto vipāke kaṭuḥ
GS40samapviu:1082: yavaḥ kaṣāyo madhuro himaś ca kaṭur vipāke kaphapittahāraḥ /
GS40samapviu:1083: vraṇeṣu pathyas tilavac ca nityaṃ prabaddhamūtro bahuvātavarśa [rcā]ḥ // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1085: medomaruttṛṭ [ḍ] haraṇo virūkṣaḥ prasādanaḥ śoṇitapittayoś ca // 2 //
GS40samapviu:1086: ebhir guṇair hīnamataś ca nityaṃ vidyād yavebhyo 'nyatha [ya] vānaśeṣaḥ /
GS40samapviu:1088: yavaḥ kaṣāyo madhuraḥ saśīto mehe hitaḥ pittakaphāmayaghnaḥ /
GS40samapviu:1089: prasṛṣṭavarco 'nyayavaḥ sabalyo balyaś ca vṛṣyaś ca male hitaś ca // 3 //
GS40samapviu:1090: śītaḥ kaṣāyaḥ surasaś ca rūkṣo mehakrimiśleṣmaviṣāpahaś ca /
GS40samapviu:1091: mādhuryayukto balavāṃs tathaiva pittāpaho veṇuyavaḥ pradiṣṭaḥ // 4 //
GS40samapviu:1094: godhūma ukto madhuro guruś ca balyaḥ sthiraḥ śukrarucipradaś ca
GS40samapviu:1095: snigdho '[ti] si śīto 'nilapītahārī [pittahantā] saṃdhānakṛcchrāśmaharaḥ saraś ca // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1097: balyaḥ śītakaraḥ saro rucikaraḥ saṃdhānakārī guruḥ /
GS40samapviu:1099: godhūmas tu manoharaḥ sthirakaraḥ śveto vikārāpahā // 2 //
GS40samapviu:1101: kaṭur vipāke kaṭukaḥ kaphaghno vidāhako vātaharaḥ kusumbhaḥ //
GS40samapviu:1104: uṣṇas tathā svāduraso 'nilaghnaḥ pittolbaṇaḥ syāt kaṭuko vipāke /
GS40samapviu:1105: pāke rase vāpi kaṭuḥ pradiṣṭaḥ siddhārthakaḥ śoṇitapittakartā // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1111: yā [pā]mākuṣṭhabhagandareṣu na tathā rucyās tu pathyā bhṛśam // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1113: tasyaitad vidaṃ [vidhaṃ] bhojyaṃ svādu viṣṭambhanaṃ guru /
GS40samapviu:1123: pittajvarātiśamanaṃ laghumudga[yū] pūṣaṃ saṃtāpahāri tad arocakanāśanaṃ ca /
GS40samapviu:1124: raktaprasādanam idaṃ yadi saindhavena yuktaṃ tadā bhavati sarvarujāpahāri // 2 //
GS40samapviu:1125: vyapagatamaladoṣāḥ prāṇinaḥ kṣīṇamātrā adhikataratṛṣārtā ye ca dharmaprataptāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1126: jvalanamukhavidagdhā ye 'tisārābhibhūtāḥ punar iha manujās te mudupū [yū]ṣasya yogyāḥ // 3 //
GS40samapviu:1128: vīrye colāḥ [ṣṇāḥ] kulitthāḥ kaphapavanaharāḥ pittaraktapradāś ca
GS40samapviu:1136: sarve pittavikārajeṣu [vi] hitā hṛdyāś ca māsūryakāḥ // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1150: balyā varṇakarā vibhuktacaṇakāḥ puṃsaś ca naite hitāḥ // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1170: śyāmākāḥ kodravā ye 'nye ye cānye 'nu ca śimbikāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1171: apathyās te na śaṃsanti [śasyante] sukhināṃ nirujāṃ tathā // 1 //
GS40samapviu:1172: yad yaj jīryaty atikṣipraṃ tat tal laghutaraṃ smṛtam /
GS40samapviu:1173: yavagodhūmamāṣāś ca tilāś cāpi navā hitāḥ // 2 //
GS40samapviu:1181: salaghurucirakāmā pheṇikātipraśastā balayati laghujīrā chardināśaṃ karoti /
GS40samapviu:1185: guravo bṛṃhaṇāḥ snigdhā balyāḥ śukrakarāḥ parāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1188: toyājyena vimarditaṃ samasitaṃ kṛtvā sutaptaṃ tathā
GS40samapviu:1189: khaṇḍājyena paced dhutāśanamṛdau kṛtvā subandhaṃ tataḥ /
GS40samapviu:1191: puṣpālambam iti bruvanti munayo nāmnā mahāmodakam // 3 //
GS40samapviu:1192: vṛṣyās tu kandarpakarā yathāgni saṃvardhitāḥ prītirucipradāyakāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1193: vātaṃ sapittaṃ praharanti bhuktāḥ sanmodakā modakarā narāṇām // 4 //
GS40samapviu:1195: modako gurur atīva vṛṣyakaḥ śleṣmalaś ciravipākatas tathā /
GS40samapviu:1199: śamayati bahu pittaṃ śleṣmakopaṃ karoti janayati jaṭharāgniṃ vātarogān nihanti /
GS40samapviu:1200: suratajanitakhedaṃ tatkṣaṇād eva hanyād amṛtaphalam udāraṃ cāru śaṃsanti khe (vai)dyāḥ // 6 //
GS40samapviu:1201: śamayaty arśaḥkṛcchrān harati savātaṃ tathā pittam // 7 //
GS40samapviu:1203: rucyā balyā balamalakarā hṛdyagandhā sthirā ca
GS40samapviu:1204: tejo varṇaṃ vapuṣi kurute śukravṛddhiṃ karoti /
GS40samapviu:1211: vṛṣyakā rocakā balyā guravaḥ syuḥ svayonivat // 9 //
GS40samapviu:1222: hanti vātaṃ raktapittaṃ śleṣmalaṃ ca viśeṣataḥ //
GS40samapviu:1227: susnigdhā vaṭikā ca dugdhamṛditā kāntyai ca saukhyapradā
GS40samapviu:1229: pittāsraṃ ca vināśayet tu satataṃ bhakṣyā supuṣṭipradā
GS40samapviu:1236: mūdgajātās tu ye kecit laghavo rucikārakāḥ /
GS40samapviu:1243: rājīcūrṇe vimiśraḥ kaphapavanaharo rocano dīpanaḥ syān
GS40samapviu:1245: kiṃ vā toyair vimiśro guḍalavaṇayutaḥ pittaraktādihantā
GS40samapviu:1249: havā [?] takramanoharāś ca vaṭakās teṣāṃ ruciṃ mārdavaṃ
GS40samapviu:1250: svādaṃ saurabhabham udvahanty aharahaḥ tān vetti viśvambharā // 18 /
GS40samapviu:1259: piṣṭair māṣadalotthair vihitā vaṭakāś ca vaṭikāś ca // 20 //
